title: Up the Line to Death: The War Poets 1914-1918: an anthology
description: Since its original publication over twenty years ago, this collection has established itself as a leading anthology of the poetry of the First World War. It includes poems by Edmund Blunden, Rupert Brooke, Robert Graves, Wilfred Owen, Isaac Rosenberg, Siegfried Sassoon and sixty-six others.
author: Brian Gardner
